text: In a male pseudohermaphrodite with salt-wasting classic 3-beta-HSD deficiency congenital adrenal hyperplasia (201810), Chang et al. (1993) found in exon 4 of the HSD3B2 gene a missense mutation at codon 248, GTC (val) was converted to AAC (asn), followed by a frameshift mutation at codon 249 in which CGA (arg) was changed to TA, resulting in the stop codon TAG (613890.0004). The patient, a Mexican Hispanic, was thought to be homozygous for this unusual mutation, the genesis of which was not understood
